bio.title: Hello there, I'm Paul Kaspriskie.
bio.description: An accomplished Philadelphia based Frontend / UI Developer with over eight years of experience. Proficiencies in developing, maintaining and extending UI components to support underlying design systems / web applications.

contact.description: This some paragraph text, not much to see here. Words are cool and I say them sometimes. Some more words for good measures.

experience.title: experience
experience.description: Over 8 years experience working with component/modular based architecture and design systems. Strategically developing, maintaining and extending UI components and modules to support underling design systems.

content.name: bevy
content.description: A shell based bulk installer and manager for vim and shell plugins.

content.name: moxie-sdk
content.description: A modular front-end architecture with an accompanying Software Development Kit (SDK) that rapidly develops and deploys React.js single page web applications (SPAs).

skills.title: skills
skills.description: This some paragraph text, not much to see here. Words are cool and I say them sometimes. Some more words for good measures.

data.title: html
data.description: Proficient use of html elements and corresponding attributes to build semantic and accessible markup.

data.title: css
data.description: Adept knowledge of CSS syntax, selectors, properties, values, layouts (flex & grid) and responsive design via media queries.

data.title: javascript
data.description: Advanced skill-set in JS syntax, event handling, data structures, asynchronous and object-oriented programming, as well as JavaScript frameworks and libraries.

data.title: ecma script
data.description: Fluent in modern ECMA syntax and principles such as classes, ES6 modules, arrow functions, template literals and Async/Await programming.

data.title: nodejs
data.description: Experienced nodeJS module architect with a strong understanding of underlying frameworks, middleware, APIs and libraries.

data.title: reactjs
data.description: Exemplary understanding of React usage and concepts such as state management, class & functional components, props/inheritance, virtual DOM, React Router and server-side rendering.

data.title: redux
data.description: Proven understanding of core redux concepts such as state management, actions/reducers, dispatch/subscribe and providers.

data.title: postcss
data.description: Utilization of core PostCSS libraries and plugins such as autoprefixer, pseudo-elements, media-queries and minification to reduce dev time and improve cross browser compatibility.

data.title: sass
data.description: Expert knowledge of Sass library such as variables/mixins, nested rules, selector inheritance, partials and control structures.
